short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep focused on what's important by blocking distracting websites while still allowing the features you need.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The #1 free website blocker. Custom blocklists with advanced allowlisting to help you stay focused on what matters!

Need a solution to limit distractions without cutting off entire websites? Don't sweat it—whether it's work must-haves or staying in touch with pals, we've got you covered! With Blokit, you can finally block out the noise while holding onto those essential site features you can't live without.

🔒 Tailored Blocking, Uninterrupted Workflow 🔒

Blokit empowers you to regain control over your digital life by allowing you to selectively block websites that often steal your time and attention. But here's the game-changer: Unlike conventional blockers that impose an all-or-nothing approach, Blokit lets you customize your blocking strategy to suit your unique needs. Want to limit access to Instagram but still keep an eye on your DMs? With Blokit, consider it done!

Key Features:

🌟 Selective Blocking: Choose which websites you want to block, and maintain access to specific features within those sites that matter most to you. Whether it's your important messages on social media or research materials on a distracting site, you're in control.

Suggested uses:
📷 Block “instagram.com”, and keep access to DMs by allowing “instagram.com/direct”
🎵 Block “youtube.com”, and keep access to Youtube Music by allowing “music.youtube.com”
💬 Block “facebook.com”, and keep access to messages by allowing “facebook.com/messages”

🌟 Customized Block page: Customize the Block page with funny or motivating quotes. Choose between a friendly visit from our mascot Simon, or opt for a serene blank page. 

Whether you're aiming to perform better at work, study more effectively, or simply curate a healthier online experience, Blokit adapts to your needs and helps you take charge.

Note: Blokit respects your privacy and does not collect any personal information.
